html:
International Supply Chain Management

This module aims to provide you with a critical understanding of the fundamental building blocks of Supply Chain Management (SCM) with a view to developing your capabilities in analyzing, (re)designing and improving supply chains.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Select and use appropriate research and experimental methods in the formulation of a self-initiated brief within the guidelines of the project brief guidelines handbook.

+  Critically assess the role of strategic supply chain management in achieving competitive advantage in an international setting.

+  Evaluate various models of supply chain structures and relationships.

+   Assess the impact of globalisation on supply chain management.

Module Content:
